name: WaveFront Program File
summary: Learn about .WFP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Since the mid-2000s, Turtle Beach has primarily produced gaming headsets and other gaming accessories, abandoning the sound card and synthesizer market. As such, you're unlikely to encounter a WaveFront Program File.

description: A WFP file was a patch file used by the Turtle Beach WaveFront synthesizer cards. It is no more used as Turtle Beach has stopped producing sound cards and synthesizers. The WFP file contains a single program or patch that can be applied to the synthesizer. WFP files can also be converted to MP4 file format.

A WFP file contains a single program, or patch, used by Turtle Beach WaveFront synthesizer cards. It represents an instrument that can be added to a WaveFront synthesizer. WaveFront-based synthesizers include the Maui, Tropez, Rio, and Monterey.

instructions: You can open WFP files using FMJ-Software Awave Studio.
